document_data.mainbody:
Desram was a bandit leader from the Sword Coast North, active in the 15 century DR.
Desram was an older human male with graying hair and beard. He wore purple mages robes, trimmed in blue and armed himself with an emerald-tipped staff.
Being a proficient spellcaster, Desram often used such offensive spells as Melfs acid arrow, ice storm, arc lightning, fiery blast, magic missiles, and could enter a state of spell flurry when threatened or hurt. He possessed resistance to fire, force, lightning, and cold magic and could cast the cure serious wounds spell.
In the late 15 century DR, Desram organized a band of bandits who forged an alliance with orcish and goblin raiders who attacked travelers and merchants on the road from Neverwinter to Waterdeep. First Lieutenant Gadain of Neverwinter sent a band of heroes to stop the raids and the group returned with a worrying eyewitness accounts â€“ orcish raiders were aided by humans. They also retrieved a map that indicated that the human bandit camp was located just off the High Road, in the westernmost foothills of the Sword Mountains. The First Lieutenant dispatched the heroes to the bandit encampment to stop Desrams raiders once and for all.
